title: Best quote of the week!
content:
_Cadaverous Waif Weight_ -- Hrant Papazian

See: [Very Thin Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012829/http:/typophile.com/node/14610)
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: sometimes when i see such fonts, i just want to walk up to them and say "eat something!"
LOL. So that's what Paris did after eating that burger...
